🚀 Quick Start

# Install dependencies
poetry install --with dev

# Run tests
pytest tests/ --cov=src

# Execute trial run
python scripts/run_trial.py

🔧 Key Features

  • AI Classification: Perplexity API integration for accurate pharmacy categorization
  • Smart Deduplication: Advanced duplicate detection with self-healing capabilities
  • Address Verification: Google Places API integration for location validation
  • Cost Optimization: Built-in credit tracking and budget management
  • Comprehensive Testing: Full test coverage with CI/CD integration
